\\Users\\AMD\\vidhra\\internal\\ast\\goo.name: AnalyzeSentimentRequest
\\Users\\AMD\\vidhra\\internal\\ast\\goo.description:
The sentiment analysis request message.

Attributes:
    document (google.cloud.language_v1.types.Document):
        Required. Input document.
    encoding_type (google.cloud.language_v1.types.EncodingType):
        The encoding type used by the API to
        calculate sentence offsets.

type_.description: Required. If the type is not set or is ``TYPE_UNSPECIFIED``, returns an ``INVALID_ARGUMENT`` error.

content.description: The content of the input in string format. Cloud audit logging exempt since it is based on user data.  This field is a member of `oneof`_ ``source``.

gcs_content_uri.description: The Google Cloud Storage URI where the file content is located. This URI must be of the form: gs://bucket_name/object_name. For more details, see https://cloud.google.com/storage/docs/reference-uris. NOTE: Cloud Storage object versioning is not supported.  This field is a member of `oneof`_ ``source``.

language_code.description: Optional. The language of the document (if not specified, the language is automatically detected). Both ISO and BCP-47 language codes are accepted. `Language Support <https://cloud.google.com/natural-language/docs/languages>`__ lists currently supported languages for each API method. If the language (either specified by the caller or automatically detected) is not supported by the called API method, an ``INVALID_ARGUMENT`` error is returned.

encoding_type.description: The encoding type used by the API to calculate sentence offsets.

\\Users\\AMD\\vidhra\\internal\\ast\\goo.name: AnnotateTextRequest
\\Users\\AMD\\vidhra\\internal\\ast\\goo.description:
The request message for the text annotation API, which can
perform multiple analysis types (sentiment, entities, and
syntax) in one call.

Attributes:
    document (google.cloud.language_v1.types.Document):
        Required. Input document.
    features (google.cloud.language_v1.types.AnnotateTextRequest.Features):
        Required. The enabled features.
    encoding_type (google.cloud.language_v1.types.EncodingType):
        The encoding type used by the API to
        calculate offsets.

type_.description: Required. If the type is not set or is ``TYPE_UNSPECIFIED``, returns an ``INVALID_ARGUMENT`` error.

content.description: The content of the input in string format. Cloud audit logging exempt since it is based on user data.  This field is a member of `oneof`_ ``source``.

gcs_content_uri.description: The Google Cloud Storage URI where the file content is located. This URI must be of the form: gs://bucket_name/object_name. For more details, see https://cloud.google.com/storage/docs/reference-uris. NOTE: Cloud Storage object versioning is not supported.  This field is a member of `oneof`_ ``source``.

Both ISO and BCP-47 language codes are accepted. `Language Support <https://cloud.google.com/natural-language/docs/languages>`__ lists currently supported languages for each API method. If the language (either specified by the caller or automatically detected) is not supported by the called API method, an ``INVALID_ARGUMENT`` error is returned.

classify_text.description: Optional. Classify the full document into categories.

moderate_text.description: Optional. Moderate the document for harmful and sensitive categories.

encoding_type.description: The encoding type used by the API to calculate offsets.
